BIO: Dwayne Johnson was born May 2, 1972. Better known by his ring name "The Rock," Jhonson is an actor and former professional wrestler. Regarded as one of the greatest professional wrestlers of all time, he was very important to success of the WWE during the Attitude Era, an industry boom period in the late 1990s and early 2000s. Johnson wrestled for WWE and WWF for eight years before pursuing a career in acting. His films have grossed over $3.5 billion in North America and over $10.5 billion worldwide, making him one of the world's highest-grossing and highest-paid actors.
